modules.name: BASICally
modules.description: Generate sequences, perform math on inputs, and even multitask with a simple BASIC-like language. Can also send Tipsy text messages to modules that support them (e.g., TTY).

modules.name: Drifter
modules.description: Varying linear function generator. Makes sequences that change in small (or large) ways. A line defined by X/Y points, each doing a random walk.

modules.name: Fermata
modules.description: Write much longer text notes, and various sizes of labels. Fermata is resizable, scrolls, has font and color choices, and more.

modules.name: Fuse
modules.description: Counts triggers and blocks/allows a signal after hitting a limit. Useful for timed composition changes, simulating components that break with overuse, or scaling a value based on the number of triggers.

modules.name: TTY
modules.description: Logs values from cables and/or text messages from Tipsy text sources (e.g., BASICally). Makes monitoring of values or logging far easier. TTY is resizable, scrolls, has font and color choices, and more.

modules.name: Memory
modules.description: The root part of a Memory system. This is what Ruminate reads and Embellish writes to.

modules.name: Ruminate
modules.description: A playback head within a Memory system of modules.

modules.name: Embellish
modules.description: A recording and playback head for a Memory system of modules.

modules.name: Depict
modules.description: Visualizes activity of other modules within a Memory system.
